title: Game keeps on freezing
body:
So, I'm trying to play League, but every time near the start, the computer freezes and I have to force a shut down. The game will buzz which notifies me that the entire computer's frozen and this has happened twice in one game. 

I am running on Windows 10.

replies.body: This shut down may be due to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was auto-enabled after a Windows 10 update.  Disabling that should fix this up!
